sentences.sContent: laws aimed at preventing unfair competition
sentences.sCn: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.sContent: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.sCn: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.sContent: She won £20,000 for unfair dismissal(= being illegally made to leave your job ).
sentences.sCn: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

remMethod.val: un(不)+fair(公平的， 公正的)→不公平的， 不公正的

trans.tranOther: not right or fair, especially because not everyone has an equal opportunity
